Classes in cellularAutomata.graphics used by cellularAutomata
CAFrame
          The cellular automata graphics.
 

Classes in cellularAutomata.graphics used by cellularAutomata.graphics
AdditionalPropertiesTabPanel
          The panel that contains any additional properties specified by the author of the CA rule.
AllPanel
          Creates the display area for all of the buttons and other controls.
AllPanelController
          Controls interactions between components on the panels.
AllPanelListener
          Listens for events from the GUI components.
AnalysisPanel
          The panel that contains the analysis selections.
CAFrame
          The cellular automata graphics.
CAMenuBar
          Creates a menu bar for the CA, including, exit, save, print, etc.
CAToolBar
          A tool bar that displays images for buttons.
DescriptionPanel
          The panel that contains a description of the currently active CA rule.
InitialStatesPanel
          The JPanel/tab that contains all of the initial state choices such as blank, random, etc.
PropertiesPanel
          The JPanel that contains all of the CA Properties such as lattice type, lattice size, etc.
RulePanel
          The tab that contains the rule and its description.
RuleTree
          Creates a tree for selecting CA rules.
StartPanel
          The panel that contains the start and stop buttons.
StatusPanel
          The panel that contains status messages.
